posts.content:
Yep, some lovely person stole my Blue Yamaha YZF R1 (Reg' R17 TCN)between the hours of 6pm and 7am on the 2nd/3rd of March whilst i was at work. Angie (my girlfriend) rang me this morning with the good news!
I've rang the police to report it stolen and have been told they'll be in touch within 3 days....
In the man time if you see or hear of anything (yeah really) I'd be greatful if you'd let me know.
I'm in the Oprington, Kent area.

Here's some photo's to see how lovely she used to be, or maybe still is!
Oh the plus side, i got away from work 1 1/2 hours early this morning!!! lol







Anton 07775 527283
